card.name: Invisible Woman
card.property: Boo! — Forced Response: After you attack an enemy, change to your other hero form.
"I guess I've given away my position."

alternate.name: Sue Storm
alternate.property: Great Minds — Resource: Exhaust Sue Storm → generate a [mental] resource ([mental] [mental] resources instead if Reed Richards is in play). If you paid for a [[TECH]] card using resources from this ability, ready Sue Storm. (Limit once per round.)

alternate.name: Invisible Woman
alternate.property: Invisible Barrier — Interrupt: When an enemy with 2 ATK or more initiates an attack against you, deal 1 damage to that enemy.
"Reed, I'm perfectly capable of protecting myself."

card.name: Mister Fantastic
card.property: Response: After Mister Fantastic enters play, remove 1 threat from each scheme or add the top card of your discard pile to your hand.
"A simple plan can often be the best one." —Mister Fantastic

card.name: Central City Estate
card.property: You get +1 REC. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Central City Estate → ready Sue Storm.

card.name: Unstable Uniform
card.property: Invisible Woman gets +1 DEF. Hero Response: After you change to [[INVISIBLE]] hero form, you get +1 THW until the end of this turn. Hero Response: After you change to [[PSIONIC]] hero form, you get +1 ATK until the end of this turn.

card.name: Flying Disk
card.property: If you are in [[PSIONIC]] hero form, you gain the [[AERIAL]] trait and your attacks gain ranged. Hero Action: Discard Flying Disk → deal 4 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Vanishing Act
card.property: Hero Action: If you are in [[INVISIBLE]] hero form, exhaust Vanishing Act and spend [mental] [energy] resources → confuse an enemy.

card.name: Force Shields
card.property: Hero Action: If you are in [[PSIONIC]] hero form, exhaust Force Shields and discard X cards with a printed [physical] resource → give X friendly characters a tough status card.

card.name: Incognito
card.property: Play only if you are in [[INVISIBLE]] hero form. Hero Action: Look at the top 4 cards of the encounter deck. For each star icon looked at this way, draw 1 card.

card.name: Infiltrate
card.property: Play only if you are in [[INVISIBLE]] hero form. Hero Action (thwart): Remove up to 4 threat from a scheme or remove up to 2 threat from each scheme.

card.name: Forceful
card.property: Play only if you are in [[PSIONIC]] hero form. Hero Action (attack): Discard any number of tough status cards from characters you control → deal 3 damage to the villain for each tough status card discarded this way.

card.name: Psionic Fields
card.property: Play only if you are in [[PSIONIC]] hero form. Hero Action (attack): Choose 2 of the following (you may choose the same option twice): • Deal 4 damage to an enemy. • Stun an enemy.

card.name: Spectral Shift
card.property: Action: Change your form. Then, if you changed to: [[INVISIBLE]] hero form - Draw 2 cards. [[PSIONIC]] hero form - Draw 1 card.

card.name: Mister Fantastic
card.property: Flexibility — Response: After you spend a [[SUPERPOWER]] card as a resource or discard it from your hand without being played, return it to your hand. (Limit once per phase.)
"I've got powers you haven't even dreamed of!"

alternate.name: Reed Richards
alternate.property: Great Minds — Resource: Exhaust Reed Richards → generate a [mental] resource ([mental] [mental] resources instead if Sue Storm is in play). If you paid for a [[TECH]] card using resources from this ability, ready Reed Richards. (Limit once per round.)

card.name: Invisible Woman
card.property: Response: After Invisible Woman enters play, ready your identity.
"Reed Richards, you are undoubtedly the most stubborn jack ass I've ever known!"

card.name: H.E.R.B.I.E.
card.property: Action: Exhaust H.E.R.B.I.E. → discard X cards from your hand, then draw X cards. Action: Exhaust then discard H.E.R.B.I.E. → draw X cards, then discard X cards from your hand.

card.name: Baxter Building
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Baxter Building → heal 2 damage from an identity. Hero Action: Exhaust Baxter Building → search the top 4 cards of your deck for a Mister Fantastic card, then add it to your hand (top 8 instead if your hero has 10 or more hit points remaining).

card.name: Fantasticar
card.property: Mister Fantastic gets +1 hand size. Hero Action: Exhaust Fantasticar → choose a player in hero form. Reduce the cost of the next event card that player plays this phase by 1.

card.name: Unstable Uniform
card.property: Mister Fantastic gets +1 DEF. Hero Response: After you defend against an attack, return the bottommost Mister Fantastic card from your discard pile to your hand.
"My costume's molecules shift." —Reed Richards

card.name: Fantasti-Flare
card.property: Uses (4 flare counters). Action: Exhaust Fantasti-Flare and remove one flare counter from it → choose a player. Reduce the cost of the next ally that player plays this phase by 1.

card.name: Neutralizer
card.property: Play under any player's control. Restricted. Uses (2 charge counters). Hero Interrupt: When you make a basic attack, exhaust Neutralizer and remove one charge counter from it → you get +3 ATK for that attack. That attack gains overkill.

card.name: Stretched Thin
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme. Then, if you have no cards remaining in your hand, remove 1 threat from each scheme in play.
"I know what I have to do to fix it...to make things right. Every problem can be solved." —Mister Fantastic

card.name: Big Reach
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to the villain. Then, deal X damage to an enemy, where X is the number of cards remaining in your hand.
"You know my answer: there's always another way. And we're going to teach you." —Mister Fantastic

card.name: Slippery
card.property: Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage, prevent 2 of that damage and draw 2 cards.
"Good thing I saved some unstable molecules for the towels!" —Mister Fantastic

card.name: Mental Gymnastics
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 + X damage to an enemy. Then, if you have no cards remaining in your hand, confuse that enemy.
"I'm Reed Richards. Nobody's smarter than me." —Mister Fantastic

card.name: Human Torch
card.property: Flame On! — Interrupt: When you place a flame counter on an enemy, deal 1 damage to that enemy. An enemy cannot have more than 3 flame counters on them.
"I am flame! And the nature of flame is to rise!"

alternate.name: Johnny Storm
alternate.property: Ignition — Action: Exhaust Johnny Storm → search the top 4 cards of your deck for a [[FIRE]] card and add it to your hand. If no cards were added to your hand this way, ready Johnny Storm. (Limit once per round.)

card.name: The Thing
card.property: Toughness. Response: After The Thing defends, ready him. (Limit once per phase.)
"Hey, y'know something? I hate to say it, but we make a pretty good team!" —Human Torch

card.name: Johnny's Workshop
card.property: Response: After you change to Johnny Storm, draw 1 card. Response: After you change to Human Torch, ready a [[FIRE]] card.

card.name: Unstable Uniform
card.property: Human Torch gets +1 DEF. Hero Response: After you take damage from an attack, place a flame counter on the attacker.
"THIS is what you want me to wear?" —Johnny Storm

card.name: Internal Combustion
card.property: Hero Action: Remove 3 flame counters from an enemy and discard Internal Combustion → draw 3 cards.
"FLAME ON!" —Human Torch

card.name: Spark
card.property: Hero Resource: Exhaust Spark → generate a [energy] resource for a [[FIRE]] card. Hero Action: Exhaust Spark → place a flame counter on an enemy.

card.name: Fly-By
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme, then remove 1 threat from a scheme for each flame counter on the villain.
"Don't say it! I'm way ahead of you Boss Man!" —Human Torch

card.name: Blaze and Daze
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. Then, if they have 3 flame counters on them, remove all those counters and stun that enemy.
"You want crispy, Reed, you got it!" —Human Torch

card.name: Radiate
card.property: Choose one: Hero Action (attack): Place 2 flame counters on X enemies. Action: Remove all flame counters from X enemies → change your form, then heal 1 damage for each flame counter removed this way (to a maximum of 5).

card.name: Nova Flame
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Human Torch → place up to 3 flame counters on an enemy, then deal 7 damage to that enemy. This attack gains overkill.
"I'm done with this. You want to be entertained? Fine... BE ENTERTAINED." —Human Torch

card.name: The Thing
card.property: Give 'Er — Action: Discard a tough status card from The Thing. Take That! — Response: After you discard a tough status card from The Thing, your attacks deal 1 additional damage until the end of the phase.

alternate.name: Ben Grimm
alternate.property: Ever-Lovin' Blue-Eyed Thing — Response: After Ben Grimm heals 4 or more damage, give him a tough status card.

card.name: Human Torch
card.property: Response: After Human Torch enters play, choose one: • Deal 1 damage to The Thing, then give The Thing a tough status card. • Deal 3 damage to the villain.

card.name: Alicia Masters
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Alicia Masters → draw 2 cards.
"This fight isn't about brains or brawn. It's about heart. And no one has more heart than my Ben." —Alicia Masters

card.name: Yancy Street Gang
card.property: Action: Exhaust Yancy Street Gang → deal 1 damage to a character. This damage gains piercing. If a tough status card was discarded this way, ready Yancy Street Gang.
"Yancy Street Gang ain't lettin' anyone ELSE bother you, Grimm. We want you all to ourselves!"

card.name: Unstable Uniform
card.property: The Thing gets +1 DEF. Hero Response: After you defend against an attack, draw a card.
"I can hardly move in this monkey suit!" —The Thing

card.name: Rock 'Em
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 4 threat from a scheme. If this removes the last threat on that scheme, give The Thing a tough status card or confuse the villain.
"Not on MY watch, fella!" —The Thing

card.name: True Grit
card.property: Hero Action: Deal 2 damage to The Thing → ready your hero and discard a status card from him. (Max once per round.)
"Ya'll never beat me! I'm just too stupid... and ugly... ta know when to quit!" —The Thing

card.name: Toughen Up
card.property: Response: After you take any amount of damage, give your identity a tough status card.
"This is Yancy Street! An' we don't bend to nobody!" —The Thing

card.name: Sock 'Em
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. If that enemy is defeated by this attack, give The Thing a tough status card or draw a card.
"Head's Up Handsome--cause I'm gonna knock yers off!" —The Thing

card.name: It's Clobberin' Time!
card.property: Hero Action: Make the following 2 attacks: • Deal 4 damage to an enemy. • Deal 4 damage to an enemy.
"Oh, it's time all right." —The Thing

card.name: Family Time
card.property: Give to the Sue Storm player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust Sue Storm → remove Family Time from the game. • Discard a card from your hand → discard this obligation.

card.name: Psycho-Man
card.property: Forced Response: After Psycho-Man activates, discard 4 cards from the encounter deck. If any Invisible Woman Nemesis cards were discarded this way, reveal them instead.
"Did you think I wear this armor merely for show?"

card.name: Emotional Masterplan
card.property: Heroes cannot change form. Action: Discard 2 cards from your hand → treat the printed text box of this card as if it were blank until the end of your turn.
Psycho-Man's manipulating your will!

card.name: Microversal Maneuvers
card.property: +2 Attach to Psycho-Man. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Forced Response: After Psycho-Man schemes against you, take 1 indirect damage. [star] Boost: Reveal this card.
"You will fear the Microverse!" —Psycho-Man

card.name: Titanic Terror
card.property: +2 Attach to Psycho-Man. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Forced Response: After Psycho-Man attacks, place 1 threat on the main scheme. [star] Boost: Reveal this card.
"Is your spirit broken yet? It soon will be." —Psycho-Man

card.name: End Of The Line
card.property: When Revealed: Discard the top 8 cards from the encounter deck. If Microversal Maneuvers or Titanic Terror are discarded this way, reveal them.
"I will tear through your minds until you BEG me to stop. Then everyone can fear the Psycho-Man." —Psycho-Man

card.name: Ben's Cure
card.property: Give to the Reed Richards player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust Reed Richards and discard a card with a printed [mental] resource → remove Ben's Cure from the game. • Take 1 damage and place 1 threat on the main scheme → discard this obligation.

card.name: Wizard
card.property: Each hero gets -1 THW.
"I possess the greatest weapon of all -- the world's greatest brain!!"

card.name: Hubris
card.property: When Revealed: Place X additional threat here, where X is the combined THW of all heroes.
Wizard has a nefarious plot in mind.

card.name: Projection
card.property: Incite 1. Surge. Attach to your identity card. [star] Boost: Attach to your identity card.
"As is your nature, clod... you look, but you do not see... the FULL picture." —Wizard

card.name: Execution
card.property: When Revealed: Discard each Projection attachment in play. For each attachment discarded this way, each player must choose to either discard 2 cards from their hand or take 2 indirect damage. If no Projection attachments were discarded this way, shuffle Execution back into the encounter deck and this card gains surge.

card.name: Flame Off
card.property: Give to the Johnny Storm player. Flip to alter-ego form and remove all flame counters from enemies in play. Then: • If up to 3 counters were removed this way, discard this obligation. • If 4 or more flame counters were removed this way, remove Flame Off from the game.

card.name: Hydro-Man
card.property: Hydro-Man cannot have flame counters placed on him. [star] Boost: Put Hydro-Man into play engaged with you.
"Hey, Hot Head! Tell me, how tough are your lungs?"

card.name: Dam It
card.property: When Revealed: Remove all flame counters from enemies in play. Then, place 1 additional threat here for each flame counter removed this way.
Hydro-Man has appeared and extinguished all the flames!

card.name: Tidal Surge
card.property: Surge. When Revealed: If Hydro-Man is in play, each player must choose to either exhaust their identity or take 3 indirect damage.
"Can you dodge a tidal wave, tough guy?" —Hydro-Man

card.name: Annual Shedding
card.property: Give to the Ben Grimm player. Flip to alter-ego form. Choose one: • Discard a tough status card from Ben Grimm → discard this obligation. • Stun or confuse Ben Grimm → discard this obligation.

card.name: Puppet Master
card.property: Puppet Master cannot be attacked while Hulk is in play. Forced Response: After Puppet Master is revealed, search the encounter deck for Hulk and reveal him.

card.name: Pulling The Strings
card.property: The minion in play with the lowest SCH gets +1 ATK and +1 SCH.
Ben Grimm's unwilling stepfather-in-law has taken control of the Incredible Hulk!

card.name: Hulk
card.property: Guard. [star] Hulk's attacks gain piercing and overkill.
"Fight me, Thing!"

card.name: Friendly Fire
card.property: When Revealed: You take X damage, where X is the ATK of the friendly character with the highest ATK. If your identity is the only friendly character in play, this card gains surge.
"You've hurt me like no one ever has, Benjamin. And tonight, I'll kill you." —Puppet Master
